KA.EP.content: theory only in conflict w/ practice if practice denies that morals exist
KA.EP.linkedContent: theory only in conflict w/ practice if practice denies that morals exist

KA.EP.content: no objective conflict btwn morals & politics: only exists subjectively in selfish disposition of men > progress of culture allowing reason to execute ideas of natural law (but so also is guilt in such transgressions) > [but only theorists can say this?]
